item.title: ZEOFORM
item.description:
ZEOFORM

Zeoform is a revolutionary material that changes everything.

item.title: Hemp Farming Legislation, Hemp Information and Advocacy - Vote Hemp
item.description:
Hemp Farming Legislation, Hemp Information and Advocacy - Vote Hemp

Vote Hemp is a national, single-issue, nonprofit organization dedicated to the acceptance of and free market for low-THC industrial hemp and to changes in current law to allow U.S. farmers to once again grow hemp as a commercial crop.

item.title: Why Kentucky farmers are quitting tobacco and turning to hemp
item.description:
Why Kentucky farmers are quitting tobacco and turning to hemp

A Farm Bill passed by Congress last year included an amendment granting states and universities the right to research hemp. Several states have since started research projects, but Kentucky is at the forefront, experimenting with creating a new industry around this plant. NewsHour's Christopher Booker reports.

item.title: The People's History
item.description:
The People's History

In this issue, we will lead you through a centuries old history of hemp and tell you about the several uses of this plant which still remains banned in the “Land of the Free”.

item.title: Our Projects
item.description:
Our Projects

Global Mana is a nonprofit organization dedicated to propelling innovative environmental solutions. Our mission is to foster global sustainability through research, development and campaigns that promote environmental education, green-smart technologies and local job growth.
